synopsis: Diyi Zhuixu, Chàng Rể Đệ Nhất, El Mejor Marido de La Historia, First Son in Law, Le Mari Immortel Dans La Ville, Menantu Laki-laki Pertama, O Melhor Marido, Revenge Planned For Ten Years, Revenge Planned For Ten Years【The Best Husband Ever】, Son-in-Law Above Them All, The Kept-Man Strikes Back, แต่งเขยเข้าบ้าน, 役立たず婿養子の逆襲, 第一赘婿, 인생 역전
